snippet.title: World Reborn - Official Trailer | WLG Showcase 2025
snippet.description: After a cataclysmic event fractures the world into many fragile realities, you've been recruited to be part of an underground community of heroes to save one of the realities—and our own—from a nefarious force called the Rot. Join the CEO and co-founder of Wicked Saints Studios for a look at World Reborn in this video for the upcoming graphic novel-style interactive story game. World Reborn will be available in 2025.
